businessProfile.name: Bellonas Pizza
businessProfile.address: 3447 W Montrose Ave, Chicago, IL 60618, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 3447 W Montrose Ave, Chicago, IL 60618, USA

reviews.text:
Great neighborhood pizza spot!
Stopped in for pickup and had an awesome experience. Got to chat with the owner George ‚Äî super friendly and great to hear the story behind the place. Staff was just as welcoming.

This is pickup only, but 100% worth going in. I grabbed a cold brew from down the street and hung out while they made the pizza.

As a pizza fan, this really hit the mark ‚Äî classic Chicago thin crust (think Father & Son‚Äôs or John‚Äôs Pizza). Thin, crispy, perfectly cooked. Glad I finally tried it ‚Äî will definitely be back!

Walked in for a cheese pizza we won on their amazing guess a number to win a freebie and ended chatting it up with the owner Jorge. Great energy, flavors are so delicious!
Old school flavor vibes!
They are an upcoming classic spot that deserves more attention!
Chers yall and don‚Äôt snooze!

Hello,
First of all, I want to thank you for the kindness and professionalism of your staff. Everyone was genuinely friendly and respectful, and I really appreciate that.
I‚Äôm very sorry to say this, but unfortunately, the chicken on the pizza had a very unpleasant smell and was almost black in color. It made the pizza inedible. Even after removing the chicken, the smell was still very strong. I just wanted to let you know respectfully in case it helps with quality control.
Bellona‚Äôs makes pizza like the kind I grew up with. Square cut, impeccable crust, and quality toppings. They‚Äôll be our new go-to takeout spot for pizza; it‚Äôs seriously the best.

My favorite local pizza joint in the Albany Park/Irving Park neighborhood. Their tavern style, especially the extra thin, is delicious. I‚Äôve never had a bad pie from Bellonas and prefer it over all the Chicago chains.

editorial_summary.overview: Modest Italian counter-serve with thin, crispy, stuffed & deep-dish pies, plus pasta & sandwiches.

detailedReviews.text: Bellonas have friendly folks, great value, and their pizza is awesome!

detailedReviews.author: Ariana Gaytan
detailedReviews.text: Amazing, interesting and quintessentially Chicago pizza! Was feeling the loss of Armand‚Äôs but have to say this is better and we‚Äôre so glad we found it and live within delivery distance!

detailedReviews.author: Charles McBarron
detailedReviews.text: Consistently fresh and delicious pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Josue Nieves

Walked in for a cheese pizza we won on their amazing guess a number to win a freebie and ended chatting it up with the owner Jorge. Great energy, flavors are so delicious!
Old school flavor vibes!
They are an upcoming classic spot that deserves more attention!
Chers yall and don‚Äôt snooze!

detailedReviews.author: Jacob Benzaquen
detailedReviews.text:
Fire as usual, have tried both the stuffed and tavern style, both incredible. Crust is amazing

Owner is awesome as well, and great to talk to, good vibes everywhere.

detailedReviews.author: B N
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a meat lover's pizza for pick up. Unfortunately there was nothing to love about the pizza. Toppings were extremely sparce, cheese basically nonexistent on top of being cold! To add insult to injury the staff was rude and unprofessional. If the entire experience rose to horrible it would be an improvement!

detailedReviews.author: Casey Hall
detailedReviews.text: The pizza empanadas were delicious. Good food from good people

detailedReviews.author: C James
detailedReviews.text:
Great neighborhood pizza spot!
Stopped in for pickup and had an awesome experience. Got to chat with the owner George ‚Äî super friendly and great to hear the story behind the place. Staff was just as welcoming.

This is pickup only, but 100% worth going in. I grabbed a cold brew from down the street and hung out while they made the pizza.

As a pizza fan, this really hit the mark ‚Äî classic Chicago thin crust (think Father & Son‚Äôs or John‚Äôs Pizza). Thin, crispy, perfectly cooked. Glad I finally tried it ‚Äî will definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: JC Graciani
detailedReviews.text: They're very kind and willing to be sure the customer is treated with respect. I'll definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Esmeralda Perez
detailedReviews.text: I have ordered pizza for pick up at this place for many years. My whole picky family loves it! My fave: half sausage and pep, and half Hawaiian with delicious jalape√±os.

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Thompson
detailedReviews.text:
Was on my way home and was hungry and was craving a slice of pizza. Looked this place up and saw the rating and was like ill give it a try. Im a southsider so i dont know about too many pizza places on the northside. Place was cool and quaint, rwminding me of one of those old school pizza shops in the 90's (I'm a millinenal lol). Plus once i saw the pizza boxes with the country of Italy on in Red, white and green on them I knew it was gonna be good.
Came was greeted by the young guys and Jorge the owner who was taking care of some business out in the front. They said they was out of slices but could make me a fresh small at the same as the slice. I was like say less lmao. Had to wait 10 minutes but that was cool. As i was waiting me and the owner engaged in a quick conversation and was cool to have a genuine talk with someone today in this climate. Plus i saw his Puerto Rican pride displayed in his ring and more in which i admire because my big brorher is Puerto Rican. He's a good guy I can tell and humble. Love that. He was telling how they make the crust and everyting from scratch (which was on full display by the guys working). After all that he gave me a free drink for my paitence and to let him know about the pizza.

Well after all that i say this....This is Chicago Pizza thru and thru! Nothing more nothing less. Good sauce, great crust, good cheese and seasoned evenly. Down to the squared cut. Definelty a spot to keep in mind next time i visit the Northside.

detailedReviews.author: Will Wright
detailedReviews.text: Bellona‚Äôs makes pizza like the kind I grew up with. Square cut, impeccable crust, and quality toppings. They‚Äôll be our new go-to takeout spot for pizza; it‚Äôs seriously the best.

detailedReviews.author: Jose
detailedReviews.text: The place is great the food is great with flavors and the workers are super kind. 5 stars

detailedReviews.author: Sunny Patel
detailedReviews.text: Great service. Really nice guys and pizza is good value

detailedReviews.author: Michael Kaplan
detailedReviews.text:
Gteat small neighborhood carry out and delivery Pizza Place... have sizes up to a huge family Pizza.. tasty and w great service....very nice people!!
my go to place for years

detailedReviews.author: Tina
detailedReviews.text: Awesome pizza!!! Great guys too. I am obsessed with the stuffed pizza. üß°üß°‚ô•Ô∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: R A
detailedReviews.text:
They have great pizza. Their service is always good. I learned about this pizzeria on an fb post.
Too bad they don't have some tables for people to enjoy their fresh pizza there.

detailedReviews.author: Kelli Christian
detailedReviews.text: Best thin crust pizza, hands down!

detailedReviews.author: Pawel Kowalczyk
detailedReviews.text: A perfect example of the classic Chicago pizza joint. Lovely, straightforward pies that satisfy. Importantly, they offer thin crust, pan, and deep dish, and they're all good. Their deep dish ("stuffed" in their menu) absolutely CRUSHES a Lou's pie, and it's seriously like 40% cheaper. Also, they're locally owned and operated - support your local pizza monger! Guys at the counter are fun and easy to talk to.

detailedReviews.author: Lucky
detailedReviews.text: these guys are always nice and the food is always tasty. hope you guys have been enjoying the cubs season

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Landgraf
detailedReviews.text: Wanted to try this neighborhood spot when I had a friend in town. She wanted to try deep dish and this place did not disappoint. We thought it was a sit down place but they only had one table in there, but we had no problem taking it back to my place.

detailedReviews.author: Teresa Melzer
detailedReviews.text: I don‚Äôt know how we didn‚Äôt know about Bellona‚Äôs until now. Their deep dish rivals the best out there, and the chicago combo pizza is incredible. Pizza empanadas are insanely delicious. My only hope is that they add the Italian beef a combo to the empanadas. This is my new favorite pizza and I am a forever fan.

detailedReviews.author: Noemi Gordon
detailedReviews.text: Chicken was overcooked and dry! The Al pastor pizza is a joke!! Never again!

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Jones
detailedReviews.text: Best Wings In Chicago!! Lime-Pepper! üî•

detailedReviews.author: Savannah Vences
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is sooooo good, little pricey but worth it in my opinion.

detailedReviews.author: jaime ramos
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza neighborhood pizza in my opinion

detailedReviews.author: Bork Kills One Leg Man
detailedReviews.text: One of the best thin crust pizza's in Chicago

detailedReviews.author: Bradley Lockwood
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had in the city.

detailedReviews.author: Luis Pedraza
detailedReviews.text: First time customer after reading a recent review on IG. The pizza was delicious. True "tavern" style crispy thin crust. Tasty toppings. We had the Chicago classic and it was spot on. Great prices. Will definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Arianna Ashafa
detailedReviews.text: Favorite Pizza Place Been Eating Here Since I Was 15 I‚Äôm 29 Now Everyone Is So Nice & Sweet Never Had A Bad Pizza

detailedReviews.author: Jc Delgado
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza I found my fave pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: Ehren Muhammad
detailedReviews.text: I would post a picture but the pizza is gone as soon as I get it - every time! This is the best Tavern style pizza by-far!

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Damiani
detailedReviews.text: A classic and authentic Chicago pizza establishment. Delicious tavern style pizza, generous portions. We got the Sunday football special and the family loved it. Owner is a stand-up guy with a great team. Thanks Bellonas for serving up delicious pies to the Albany Park & Irving Park community.

detailedReviews.author: [Soul Rebel In Stereo]
detailedReviews.text: Comfy ASF

detailedReviews.author: Maggie A Women with a Vision
detailedReviews.text:
10+ years of ordering from Bellona's Pizza, and it remains my go-to spot! Fantastic pizza, fantastic value. Highly recommend!
Actually, it‚Äôs my favorite pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Mauricio
detailedReviews.text: Italian beef pizza is a must try ! I bought a medium after the first bite I couldn‚Äôt stop eating it!

detailedReviews.author: Edwin
detailedReviews.text: One of my favorite pizza‚Äôs to eat. üëçüèªüëçüèª

detailedReviews.author: Mario Torres
detailedReviews.text: Bellonas is my favorite neighborhood joint, the new owners have brought it back to life! Great service and even better true Chicago thin pizza üî•

detailedReviews.author: Lori Goddard
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely delicious! And for less than so many others in the neighborhood. Tried for the first time for something different a while ago and still love it. Sauce is zesty sweet, crust super crisp, plenty of cheese, nice amount of ingredients. Super friendly staff too! We'll be back to try a few other things, but certainly worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Martin Mulchrone
detailedReviews.text: They have some of the best old school Chicago Thin crust that I have had recently.  Definitely an old school mom and pop store.  The crust is cooked perfectly and the sauce is very flavorful.

detailedReviews.author: Sylvia J
detailedReviews.text: Best takeout pizza spot in the Albany Park/western Ravenswood area. Started coming here recently and it's a regular weekend fixture for my family now. Wonderful people who take pride in what they make. Both the deep dish and tavern style are delicious and true to style. Very reasonable prices too. An absolute gem.

detailedReviews.author: Zachary Fox
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is a 10/10. Customer service is a 10/10. Just know it is NOT dine in.

detailedReviews.author: Hipolito Bello
detailedReviews.text: Great thin crust pizza I suggest the sausage and cheese

detailedReviews.author: B T
detailedReviews.text: Soon to be moving to the neighborhood and tried out Bellonas for the first time last week. It was soo good I had it catered for my kids bday party. I lost count of how many people asked, "where'd you get the pizza from, this is good!?" Great pie, friendly staff, reasonable pricing and specials. I will be a frequent customer going forward. Highly recommend!!!

detailedReviews.author: Emily D
detailedReviews.text: Our go-to neighborhood spot for pizza

detailedReviews.author: Jack Warrick
detailedReviews.text: This is the place. Great food and the best service. 10/10 from me

detailedReviews.author: Luis Vega
detailedReviews.text:
I've lived in the area for over 30 years and never tried this pizza. I don't know what was wrong with me. I recently ordered a Large Pan Cheese with Sausage, which was cooked to perfection. Everyone in my family was amazed by the sauce. I would honestly say that the sauce was good, and the pizza was cooked to perfection. It had the perfect amount of cheese, toppings, and sauce. Bravo to all the cooks!

Thank you so much. You are now our new pizza place, and we apologize for not ordering sooner. We will make up for it. I haven't tried the thin crust, but I bet it will also be delicious.

Thanks again!!!

detailedReviews.author: Landscape Now
detailedReviews.text: So this is my experience I ordered a small sausage cheese Canadian bacon$15 picked it up first fight was okay some pieces were burnt spoke to the manager he got an attitude didn't want to do a refund but I told him he needed to give me a refund he did I think the pizza is okay but I think they're rushing to get the pizzas out so quickly but they're not paying attention to the details I saw the inside of the store could definitely use use some freshening up I'm giving this review not to put him down for the guys who seem to be working pretty hard but to for them to read this review and make the changes so that they can become a good pizza place when you sell pizza in Chicago people expect a certain standard

detailedReviews.author: Tom Brunner
detailedReviews.text: Owner was incredibly nice and gave us recommendations. Great pizza, great people, will come back when coming through chicago!

detailedReviews.author: Zoe Pace
detailedReviews.text: I ordered here like twice and by the third time, they greeted me by name when I walked in. Jorge is so kind and they have a great family vibe amongst the staff. The pizza is the best in the area + the price is right!  LOVE this place!

detailedReviews.author: Jerry Brown
detailedReviews.text: Visited Chicago and had a deep dish from Bellonas. It was our first ever Chicago deep dish. It was AMAZING! Florida needs a  Bellonas. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: Marcie Bryant
detailedReviews.text: The pizza here is so good and SUPER cheesy! There's even a lot of cheese in the pan pizza which is less than the deep dish pizza!! The guys there looked like they enjoyed making these pizzas and were very proud of their food creations, rightfully so! The man who talked to us and took our order even took a picture of one pizza bc it looked great and he was happy with it! I wish I would've gotten a picture before we dug in. They love what they do and their pizzas are fabulous! Chicago staple!

detailedReviews.author: Geena Hines
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm a fan of the deep dish! I love the flavor of the sauce, It‚Äôs rich and herby. The amount of cheese was perfect.

detailedReviews.author: Noel
detailedReviews.text: The pan pizza is the best pizza I've ever had

detailedReviews.author: Joe Olivier
detailedReviews.text: Solid local pizza joint serving up fresh pies. I love how I can walk here and pickup.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Veloria
detailedReviews.text: So happy I finally ordered from here, passed by so many times, and have now ordered from here many times. Great people, absolutely delicious pizza üçï üòã

detailedReviews.author: Esteban Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: The deep dish here is one of my favorites, the ingredients are quality and can‚Äôt beat the prices. I‚Äôm not a big fan of thin crust in general but I actually liked theirs. Highly recommend this place.

detailedReviews.author: Honest Reviewer
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a pizza for delivery. 20 min later I look to see where my pizza is and they cancelled it. I called the restaurant and it was because I was just out of their delivery area. Why have the restaurant on the app slice and it accept my order only to have me waiting for a pizza that would of never came. They couldn't even call me and tell me. Disappointed. Now I have to wait two days for my money to be returned.

detailedReviews.author: Jorge Alcaraz
detailedReviews.text: I can‚Äôt believe I never knew about this place, great sauce ,great pizza! It is now my favorite pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Nancy Kapan
detailedReviews.text: Truly amazing pizza. Buttery fresh crust.  You will always have fresh dough and fresh ingredients. You must try the deep dish. This is the only place that has Al Pastor thin  crust pizza. Moth watering.

detailedReviews.author: steven
detailedReviews.text: Very good and very tasty pizza

detailedReviews.author: Nick Pasek
detailedReviews.text: Amazing deep dish special pizza. Everyone  was really nice.

detailedReviews.author: Danny Maller
detailedReviews.text: Great Chicago pizza. Stopped in for a slice over lunch, the owner was super nice.

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Mcdonald
detailedReviews.text: Great food great customer service

detailedReviews.author: Catherine O'Connor
detailedReviews.text: We ordered a deep dish tonight and OMG it was SO good. Best deep dish I ever had. Excellent quality of ingredients. Cooked just right. Everything about it was just MAGNIFICO! We will definitely order again.

detailedReviews.author: Andy Bonjean
detailedReviews.text: As strong a pizza game as there is in Chicago. Thin crust Bellona‚Äôs Special checked all the boxes and I appreciated the friendly staff making eye contact while handing me my order.

detailedReviews.author: Eva Gelfand
detailedReviews.text:
After having several bad pizzas from a couple of different places that I normally order from, I found Bellonas. I don't know what's happening with quality in the food world, but I'm super glad I looked into some other neighborhood places!!
The gentleman that took my order was very friendly, placed my order quickly and I received it in less than an hour and it was DELICIOUS!! I was craving old school Chicago thin crust with good quality cheese and sausage, and that is exactly what I got! Bellonas is my new go-to pizza place!

detailedReviews.author: ImaApparition
detailedReviews.text: Fire!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise Bellona's for their delicious and quintessentially Chicago-style pizza, especially the extra-thin and stuffed crusts. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and positive customer service, including interactions with the owner, is a standout feature that customers love. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Bellona's reliable and often early delivery service, ensuring hot and delicious food upon arrival, is highly valued by customers. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to poor food quality and customer service (e.g., unpleasant smell of chicken, sparse toppings, rude staff) - review management can address this concern
Order cancellation and lack of communication regarding delivery issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness as noted by the need for store freshening up - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.text: My favorite local pizza joint in the Albany Park/Irving Park neighborhood. Their tavern style, especially the extra thin, is delicious. I‚Äôve never had a bad pie from Bellonas and prefer it over all the Chicago chains.

positive.author: Ulysses Avila
positive.text: My Go To for pizza. They never disappoint.

Hello,
First of all, I want to thank you for the kindness and professionalism of your staff. Everyone was genuinely friendly and respectful, and I really appreciate that.
I‚Äôm very sorry to say this, but unfortunately, the chicken on the pizza had a very unpleasant smell and was almost black in color. It made the pizza inedible. Even after removing the chicken, the smell was still very strong. I just wanted to let you know respectfully in case it helps with quality control.

negative.text: Ordered a meat lover's pizza for pick up. Unfortunately there was nothing to love about the pizza. Toppings were extremely sparce, cheese basically nonexistent on top of being cold! To add insult to injury the staff was rude and unprofessional. If the entire experience rose to horrible it would be an improvement!

negative.author: Noemi Gordon
negative.text: Chicken was overcooked and dry! The Al pastor pizza is a joke!! Never again!
